item.title: Hello
item.description: Ningxin Su is currently a third-year Ph.D. candidate in the Computer Engineering group, Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Toronto. She received her M.E. Degree and B.E. Degree from The University of Sheffield and Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications in 2020 and 2019, respectively. Ningxin loves dancing, singing and travelling. She thinks the museum is the best place to learn the history of a city, so one of her life goals is to visit as many museums as possible.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Refereed Conference Papers Ningxin Su, Baochun Li. “Asynchronous Federated Unlearning,” in the Proceedings of IEEE INFOCOM 2023, New York Area, U.S.A., May 17-20, 2023. Ningxin Su, Baochun Li. “How Asynchronous can Federated Learning Be?” in the Proceedings of the 30th IEEE/ACM International Symposium on Quality of Service (IWQoS 2022), Online, June 10 — 12, 2022.
